content.prompt: Which of the following contributed to the outbreak of the Seven Years’ War (French and Indian War) in North America?

choices.label: Intensified competition between France and Britain over colonies
Efforts by Britain to monopolize tobacco sales in Europe
Spanish attempts to end British control of the trans-Atlantic slave trade
Britain’s desire to enact new taxes on Native American nations

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
